Name: Ardor
About the game: Slice and dodge your way through a hex grid in this puzzle tactics card game. Avoid danger while dealing damage with the cards on hand, while powering up your deck. Turn Based Combat: Consider enemy attack patterns and decide how to navigate them while lashing out along the way. Upgrade any number on any card: Augment your deck's potential, while leaning into your own playstyle. Combine any card with any other card: Trim and craft your deck. Circumvent limitations of cards by creating your own synergies. Handmade Levels: A roguelike mode of varied scenarios that pose specific strategic questions, but also... Endless Levels: An Endless Mode of randomly generated arenas that scale in difficulty to keep up with your deck. Join us over on the Discord Server or r/ArdorTactics to discuss suggestions and share feedback! /
